description.oldValue:
Additional functionality with the Front Row experience, a layout for hybrid meetings that enables users to see remote attendees at eye level and on dual screens. Users can see Chat in the right panel and participants with raised hands on the left panel. And, Meeting Chat is added in the Gallery, Large Gallery, and Together Mode layouts.
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue:

for hybrid meetings that enables users to see remote attendees at eye level and
on dual screens. Users can see Chat in the right panel and participants with
raised hands on the left panel. And, Meeting Chat is added in the Gallery,
Large Gallery, and Together Mode layouts.
